duck: True plantain – a particular subgroup of cultivated varieties (cultivars) of Musa species from the AAB group
Plantain (cooking) – any starchy banana that is used in cooking, for which no clear cultivar definition exists. This definition goes by culinary use. Commonly called cooking banana or plantain.

plantain definition: any of a genus ('''Plantago''' of the family Plantaginaceae, the plantain family) of herbs with basal rosettes of usually lanceolate or elliptical leaves and spikes of minute greenish flowers.
Plantago – a herbaceous plant not related to Musa (bananas)
Rhino Horn banana - Rhino Horn bananas, also called Rhino Horn plantains or African Rhino Horn, are hybrid banana cultivars from Africa.

Fried plantain - Fried plantain is an dish cooked wherever plantains grow, from West Africa through Central Africa to East Africa,and in many parts of Southeast Asia such as Indonesia, where fried snacks are wid...

wiki.text:
'Plantain' may refer to:

;Banana related
* Plantain (cooking) – any starchy banana that is used in cooking, for which no
  clear cultivar definition exists. This definition goes by culinary use.
  Commonly called cooking banana or plantain.
:* Fried plantain
* Plantain group - AAB cultivars (acuminata x acuminata x balbisiana)
:* True plantain – a particular subgroup of cultivated varieties (cultivars) of
:  Musa species from the AAB group
:* African Plantain - cultivar subgroup
::*Rhino Horn banana
:* Iholena subgroup - cultivar subgroup that belongs to the informal group of
:  Pacific plantains
:* Maoli-Popo'ulu subgroup - cultivar subgroup that belongs to the informal
:  group of Pacific plantains
::* Maqueño banana
::* Popoulu banana

;Other
* [[Plantago]] – a herbaceous plant not related to Musa (bananas)
wiki.title: plantain
